title: iDiyilum puyalilum iLattu
sahitya:
iDiyilum puyalilum iLaittu vandEn ayyA en mukham pArAyO ayyA iDargaLait-tIrAyO


anupallavi

  aDi nizhal enrum kuDi pughundE ini alaiyAmal ulaiyAmal nilaiyAi irundiDavE


caraNam 1    Anava selvarin aDimaiyAi vAzhAdun anbanAi vAzhndiDavaruLAi
Ashaip-puyalennai vIsi alaikkAduL amaidiyil vAzhndiDavaruLAi
    caraNam 2    kONu manam nimirak-kANumei vazhiyilE koNDenai naDattiDa vArAi 
kOvE tannaruT-kAvE ennuyir dEvE ini engE pOvEn un sEvakan
